user_prompt: What file contains the main function for this project?

response:

$(view .)

I will also search for common "main" patterns in the codebase.
$(text-search "main")

$(view crates/moss/src/main.rs:1-50)

I will search for the `main` function in `crates/moss/src/main.rs` to confirm it is the entry point.

$(text-search "fn main" crates/moss/src/main.rs)

$(view crates/moss/src/main.rs)

$(answer The main function for this project is located in `crates/moss/src/main.rs`.

Additional findings:
